short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a strong password in context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the increasing prevalence of data breaches, it's more important than ever to use strong, secure passwords to protect our online accounts. However, creating and remembering complex passwords for every account can be difficult. This is where a browser extension like "Generate Strong Password" for Google Chrome comes in.

This extension allows users to generate strong, random passwords with a single click from their browser's context menu. When you right-click on a text field where you need to enter a password, you can select "Generate Strong Password" to create a new, random password.

The best feature of this extension is the ability to customize the password by choosing its length and the characters that make it up. You can create passwords ranging from 8 to 32 characters and choose to include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and symbols. This ensures that each password is unique and secure.

Another useful feature of the extension is the ability to automatically copy the generated password to the clipboard. This saves the hassle of having to manually select and copy the password, which can sometimes be tedious and error-prone.

In summary, "Generate Strong Password" is a handy and easy-to-use extension for anyone looking to create strong, secure passwords for their online accounts. With the customization of length and characters, as well as the automatic copy function, this extension can help strengthen the security of your personal online data.
